title: I'm 'EAMON' For You, Bro
body_text:
FITZPATRICK BROTHERS Head-to-Head
Eamon against Dan!
"The Writer's" latest booking pitted two brothers on different sides of the table. 12 year-old
Eamon
, 19 year-old
Dan
- the family fun hasn't ceased quite yet!
Flash Results by Game
Eamon: 1, 3, 4
Dan: 2, 5
With its tagline "we spell out our ________ words," ONE FIFTY TWO continued the magnificent run that
EastCoastDodgeball
has seen over the summer months. And the score proves it all.
It's not going to get much closer than this "blood" bath.
Eamon, 3. Dan, 2.
The Rules
: Classic two-team match-up.
The Match
: Eamon Fitzpatrick defeated brother Dan Fitzpatrick, 3 - 2.
Captains Statistics
: Eamon 1-1-0 / Dan 0-1-0. This was Dan's debut captains encounter.
Moments & Stars
: Diana DiBuccio with two back-to-back bulletball catches; John Tronolone fumbling a Dan Fitzpatrick-deflected bulletball; 10 year-old Keegan Nesbitt viciously hit twice on the sidelines; Justin Pierce and Bobby Vetrano saving Cap. Eamon from defeat in the inconclusive Game 6; Mike Edwards's all-star performance.
Attendance
: 26, comprised of 22 men and 4 women
New Players
: Dan Carrol, Jon Yochum, Keegan Nesbitt
Other Notes
: It has been 11 straight weeks without a
Wet War
.
All in the Family
There have been numerous confrontations between supposed "loved" ones, the best known perhaps involving those in the Adams and Winston families. One musn't forget about the sisters Nogueira or the Butler brothers either who have eached tried to settle their differences on the dodgeball battlegrounds.
________________________________________
_______________
coming up next ...
The year-long struggle with no end in sight ..
WALL vs. ALL 8
only at DODGEBALL 153 on August 30. And don't forget about the special Pete & Elda's afterparty!
body_html:
FITZPATRICK BROTHERS Head-to-Head
Eamon against Dan!

"The Writer's" latest booking pitted two brothers on different sides of the table. 12 year-old Eamon, 19 year-old Dan - the family fun hasn't ceased quite yet!

Flash Results by Game
Eamon: 1, 3, 4
Dan: 2, 5

With its tagline "we spell out our ________ words," ONE FIFTY TWO continued the magnificent run that EastCoastDodgeball has seen over the summer months. And the score proves it all.

It's not going to get much closer than this "blood" bath.

Eamon, 3. Dan, 2.

The Rules: Classic two-team match-up.
The Match: Eamon Fitzpatrick defeated brother Dan Fitzpatrick, 3 - 2.
Captains Statistics: Eamon 1-1-0 / Dan 0-1-0. This was Dan's debut captains encounter.
Moments & Stars: Diana DiBuccio with two back-to-back bulletball catches; John Tronolone fumbling a Dan Fitzpatrick-deflected bulletball; 10 year-old Keegan Nesbitt viciously hit twice on the sidelines; Justin Pierce and Bobby Vetrano saving Cap. Eamon from defeat in the inconclusive Game 6; Mike Edwards's all-star performance.
Attendance: 26, comprised of 22 men and 4 women
New Players: Dan Carrol, Jon Yochum, Keegan Nesbitt
Other Notes: It has been 11 straight weeks without a Wet War.

All in the Family
There have been numerous confrontations between supposed "loved" ones, the best known perhaps involving those in the Adams and Winston families. One musn't forget about the sisters Nogueira or the Butler brothers either who have eached tried to settle their differences on the dodgeball battlegrounds.

_______________________________________________________

coming up next ...

The year-long struggle with no end in sight .. WALL vs. ALL 8 only at DODGEBALL 153 on August 30. And don't forget about the special Pete & Elda's afterparty!
